Segmentation Property¶

class SegmentationProperty.SegmentationProperty(points, segments, segmentKeys=None, segmentAttributes=None)[source]¶

Holds segments.

Each segment represented by an integer in range (0, nSegments). The segment -1 is used for unsegmented points Can hold result of filter.

In this case Count is 2, and segments has values of 0 and 1. (Consider inheritance for convenience).

Attributes

Methods

property GetAllSegments¶
GetSegment(label)[source]¶

Return a PointSubSet object from the points in segment labeled “label” in case there are no points with the given label return None (and NOT an empty SubSet)

Parameters

label (int) – the label

Returns

subset of the points that are segmented as the label

Return type

PointSubSet

property RGB¶
UpdatePointLabel(pointIndex, newLabel)[source]¶

Change the label of a certain point. This method doesn’t change the number of labels in the property

property segmentAttributes¶

Retrieves the attributes for all the segments :return: list of attributes
